data.title: Kutumb turns 19, Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan thank fans for all the love
data.meta_description: Hiten Tejwani shared a post thanking his team and fans as Kutumb completed 19 years. The actor starred opposite his wife Gauri Pradhan in the Ekta Kapoor show.
data.text:
Ekta Kapoor's Kutumb turned 19 years on October 29. The first episode of the show, starring Hiten Tejwani and Gauri Pradhan was aired on Sony TV on October 29, 2001. Hiten and Gauri fell in love on the sets of Kutumb and later got married, played a couple on the show.

HITEN TEJWANI THANKED FANS FOR ALL THE LOVE

Hiten Tejwani shared a post thanking his team and fans. He wrote, "19 years ..a big hug and thank you so much for the love everyone ..Thank u @ektarkapoor @shobha9168 @balajitelefilmslimited @immaheshpandey @sarnadheeraj @s_w_a_p_n_a @niveditabasu @sanjaymemane ..all my artists , technicians, makeup guys and spot dadas..All my fans .. #hitentejwani #gpradhan #kutumb #19 #love #gratitude (sic)."

advertisement

Gauri Pradhan reshared Hiten's post on Instagram with heart emojis. Hiten and Gauri played Pratham and Gauri on the show, who were in the same college. They initially hated each other but gradually fell in love.

Hiten and Gauri are parents to twin kids Nivaan and Katya. The couple tied the knot in 2004 and were blessed with twins in 2009. Currently, Hiten is seen on Star Bharat's Gupta Brothers - Chaar Kunware From Ganga Kinaare, while Gauri was last seen on Tu Aashiqui.

Apart from Kutumb, Ekta Kapoor's Kasautii ZIndagii Kay also turned 19 on October 29. The show starred Shweta Tiwari, Cezanne Khan and Ronit Roy in lead roles.
